channel.title: blockchain on Technical Portfolio of Chris Ried
channel.description: Recent content in blockchain on Technical Portfolio of Chris Ried

item.title: Blockchain Analytics
item.description: The following post provides some context around the many many different technologies that are currently out there in the blockchain space. Much of these are changing on a monthly basis with new things coming out all the time. So I thought it might be good to have a document that tries to compile what this landscape currently looks like in 2022. See the Pen Untitled by Chris Ried (@cdr6934) on CodePen.
